item.title: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy

info.message: [B][COLOR ffffff00]Plot:[/COLOR][/B] [B] Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of “The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy.” [/B]
